005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import inet.ipaddr.ipv6.IPv6Address;
013
014public interface IIPv6AddressItem extends IIPAddressItem {
015
016  /**
017   * Construct a new IPv6 item using the provided {@code value}.
018   *
019   * @param value
020   *          an IPv6 value
021   * @return the new item
022   */
023  @NonNull
024  static IIPv6AddressItem valueOf(@NonNull IPv6Address value) {
025    return new IPv6AddressItemImpl(value);
026  }
027
028  /**
029   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
030   *
031   * @param item
032   *          the item to cast
033   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
034   *         cast to this type
035   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
036   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
037   */
038  @NonNull
039  static IIPv6AddressItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
040    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.IP_V6_ADDRESS.cast(item);
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  IPv6Address getValue();
045
046  @Override
047  default IIPv6AddressItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
048    return cast(item);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
053    return compareTo(cast(item));
054  }
055}
